title: Academy for the Peculiar - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   School Life
tags: Female Protagonist   Magic   Psychic Powers   Special Abilities
author: Ynativity
description:
Absconditum Series (Book #1)

Cather Rions never wished for more. She is content with what she have, even if she still lacks many. Her only wish is to get herself out in a world wherein she thought she doesn't belong. Until one day, everything turned upside down. Her bestfriend gone, her normal life vanished.

What will happen if she will be thrown to her own luxurious hell with a hot devil?

Not at all wishes came true, even if you work hard, especially if there is something destined to happen to you. 

As she slowly uncovers the missing pieces of her past, that's when she discovers the lies of one special person from the Academy for the Peculiar.>
